quote: In twenty-one years, I have not considered changing to Todd. The bizarre course of my life suggests that Odd is more suited to me, whether it was conferred by my parents with intention or fate.
quote_letters: IN TWENTY-ONE YEARS I HAVE NOT CONSIDERED CHANGING TO TODD THE BIZARRE COURSE OF MY LIFE SUGGESTS THAT ODD IS MORE SUITED TO ME WHETHER IT WAS CONFERRED BY MY PARENTS WITH INTENTION OR FATE
